meanings.definition: A person who practices chiropractic medicine.
meanings.sent1: The chiropractor helped my back feel better.
meanings.sent2: I have an appointment with the chiropractor next week.
meanings.sent3: The chiropractor joked that my spine was as straight as a ruler.
meanings.sent4: After seeing the chiropractor, I felt like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The chiropractor's hands worked magic on my aching back.

meanings.definition: A healthcare professional who specializes in the diagnosis and treatment of musculoskeletal disorders, particularly those affecting the spine.
meanings.sent1: My sister is training to become a chiropractor.
meanings.sent2: The chiropractor recommended exercises to strengthen my back.
meanings.sent3: The chiropractor compared my spine to a twisted pretzel.
meanings.sent4: Visiting the chiropractor was like getting a tune-up for my body.
meanings.sent5: I trust my chiropractor to take care of my spine issues.

meanings.definition: One who uses manual manipulation of the spine to alleviate pain and improve overall health.
meanings.sent1: The chiropractor gently adjusted my spine.
meanings.sent2: I feel much better after the chiropractor realigned my back.
meanings.sent3: The chiropractor made a funny noise when cracking my back.
meanings.sent4: Seeing the chiropractor was like hitting the reset button for my body.
meanings.sent5: I always leave the chiropractor's office feeling refreshed and relaxed.
